name: QuickCash
description: A job posting app for job seekers and employers to connect. Developed using React, Firebase, and styled with custom CSS.

name: Chess Game
description: A Python-based chess game built with Pygame. I implemented game logic, a player vs AI mode, and a user interface for the game.

name: Portfolio Website
